name: A light yellow burnished leather cloak
data: It increases the users wisdom noticably.
It increases the users intelligence noticably.
It has superb armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users physical resistance adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
